property.onkeydown: (function(self) { var placeholder = self.placeholder; var val = new RegExp(self.value, 'gi'); var elems; if (placeholder.match(/Time/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventTime'); } else if (placeholder.match(/Description/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventDescription'); } else if (placeholder.match(/Type/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventType'); } else { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventTitle'); } for (var n=0; n < elems.length; n++) { var elem = elems[n]; if (elem.innerHTML.match(val)) { elem.parentNode.style.display = 'table-row'; } else { elem.parentNode.style.display = 'none';} }})(this);

property.onkeyup: (function(self) { var placeholder = self.placeholder; var val = new RegExp(self.value, 'gi'); var elems; if (placeholder.match(/Time/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventTime'); } else if (placeholder.match(/Description/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventDescription'); } else if (placeholder.match(/Type/gi)) { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventType'); } else { elems = document.getElementsByClassName('EventTitle'); } for (var n=0; n < elems.length; n++) { var elem = elems[n]; if (elem.innerHTML.match(val)) { elem.parentNode.style.display = 'table-row'; } else { elem.parentNode.style.display = 'none';} }})(this);
